p: All varieties of Ficus deltoidea were identified by Prof. Dr. Nashriyah Mat (expertise in agricultural plant science, physiology, and systematics (taxonomy) from Universiti Sultan Zainal Abidin (UniSZA)). The FDT, FDK, FDI, FDD, FDA, FDB, and FDB leave samples were collected from various places in Malaysia under voucher specimen numbers 00366, 00048, 00303, 00050, 00368, 00057, and 00313, respectively. The voucher specimens were deposited in the Herbarium of School of Agricultural Science and Biotechnology, Faculty of Bioresources and Food industry, UniSZA.
